ResearchProjectDef.label: metabolic textiles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Pursue the creation of specialist equipment and attire designed to assist with the process of digestion and weight gain.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ultratech metabolic textiles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to craft the pinnacle of high-tech clothing and accessories that greatly transform the wearer's metabolism and supports indolent lifestyles.
